name: Chrystal Chore City
description:
(IMPORTANT NOTE: Start the game in Admin mode to have sounds.)

This game was made in 48 hours for the Global StartupCities Gamejam 2020.

In this Game you mine materials in a mine shaft, you get money for these material, with this money you built up your city and this city works for you in the mine shaft so you can get more money, a Win-Win-Situation. 

Mine your way to success and a beautiful rich city.

Assets used:

Vedctor icons:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/clean-vector-icons-132084

Cave pixel art 2D:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-caves-136235

Button animation:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/jumpin-jumpout-ui-animation-with...

Sound effects:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256

Music:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/fantasy-ambient-music-pack-498...

2D Assets were made in Paint.net
3D Assets in MagicaVoxel:
https://ephtracy.github.io/

Developers:

Steven Rzenca - (Art and Programming)

Markus Baars - (Programming)
